page.description: Get the table associated with an object.
page.discussion: The .TABLE_GET() method returns a pointer to the table that the query list is based on.

section.title: Example
section.description: This script finds the name of the table associated with the pointer.
section.example: dim tbl as P dim qry as P dim ptr as P tbl = table.open("test") query.filter = "ID <> ''" query.options = "D" qry = tbl.query_create() ptr = qry.table_get() ? ptr.name_get() = "TEST"
